subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Mike Magee had a goal and an assist, and Juan Pablo Ángel scored his sixth goal in six games as the Red Bulls beat the Houston Dynamo, 3-0, on Sunday. Goalkeeper Jon Conway made four saves for his sixth shutout of the season for the Red Bulls (8-6-7), who won their third in a row.
